name: Sag-Ulo
description:
Sag - Ulo (is a Cebuano word which means memorize) is a memory game in which you the player will memorize a specific code of number in a 3 second time frame. After the 3 second time frame the code will now disappear and you will now put the correct code using the buttons that have been provide. If you provide a correct number you earn one point but if you put the wrong code your live (attempts) will be deducted.

Note if you want to just play this on the browser make sure it supports Web GL.
